## Q1 {-}

Express each of the following expressions in their simplest factorized form.

1.1. $7x+35$.

1.2. $3x-51$.

1.3. $6m+3n$.

1.4. $5f+10+15k$.

1.5. $10x-2+3y^2+3y$.

1.6. $9xy-3x$.

1.7. $a^2+ab$.

1.8. $4m^2-8nm+12m$.

1.9. $12wx^2+16wx$.

1.10. $a^3 b+ab^2+ ab^3$.

1.11. $x(x-6)+3(6-x)$.

1.12. $3w+3z+xw+xz$.

1.13. $2ab+ b^2-b-2a$.

1.14. $a^2 b+3a^2+ab+3a-2b-6$.

## Q2 {-}

Express each of the following expressions in their simplest factorized form.

2.1. $x^2+6x+5$.

2.2. $x^2-3x-4$.

2.3. $x^2-4x+3$.

2.4. $2x^2-13x+21$.

2.5. $5x^2-10x+5$.

2.6. $x^2-xy-6y^2$.

2.7. $12x^2 y^2+8xy^2-4y^2$.

2.8. $x^2-4yx-x+4y$.

2.9. $x^2+y^2-2xy$.

2.10. $x^2-y^2$.

## Q3 {-}

Using your workings from Q1 and Q2 , solve the following expressions for $x$.

3.1. $7x+35 = 0$.

3.2. $x(x-6)+3(6-x)=0$.

3.3. $x^2-4x+3=0$.

3.4. $12x^2 y^2+8xy^2-4y^2=0$.

3.5. $x^2-4yx-x+4y=0$.
